listing.listing_description:
Peaceful and serene, this beautiful lakefront property is surrounded by mountain views, lush lawns, and private walking trails that wind through the wetlands of Queenstown, New Zealand. WIth four full-size bedrooms and one kid's bunk room, Omaio is perfect for secluded family getaways. Equipped with a private tennis court and petanque pitch, Omaio is ideal for travelers who like to maintain an active lifestyle. Within a short drive of the villa, you ’ll find golf, skiing, Queenstown’s bustling city center, and more.

Taking full advantage of its three-hundred-sixty-degree mountain views, Omaio’s floorplan stretches lengthwise, allowing each of its bedrooms and the open concept living area to access the breathtaking vista and outdoor spaces. At its center, an imposing stone fireplace sets the perfect tone for an elegant dinner soiree or a cozy night in with the family. High-end designer furnishings and electronics decorate the spacious main room that contains the fireplace lounge, formal dining area, and state of the art kitchen. Outside, you’ll love relaxing by the gas fireplace and dining alfresco on warmer evenings.

Omaio comes with a fully equipped kitchen, gas barbeque, dishwasher, and formal dining with seating for ten. After dinner, move the party to the living room, where the entertainer in your group can provide the background music on the piano. When it’s time for bed, Omaio’s three en-suite bedrooms and two multi-bed suites all feature direct access to private terraces and soaring mountain views.

The Queenstown area is full of exciting attractions no matter what time you’re visiting New Zealand. If there’s a golfer in the group, Queenstown Golf Course is a great way to enjoy the dynamic landscape of New Zealand while you challenge yourself to a round. The Wakatipu Yacht Club is a beautiful area for a stroll, private yacht rental, or a fishing charter. And, Main Street in Queenstown is where you’ll find the most shopping, dining, and nightlife options. If you’re on the island to ski, Coronet Peak and The Remarkables are both under thirty-kilometers from home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend a dream of a beach holiday in laid-back luxury at Coonanga. Filled with light and beautiful modern pieces, this four-bedroom Northern Beaches vacation rental puts a stylish twist on the classic beach cottage. Even better, it’s only a few minutes’ walk from secluded Avalon Beach and downtown Avalon, where you’ll find a casual surfing scene and plenty of cafés and shops.

Coonanga is tucked onto a lush private lot with its own swimming pool, gas barbecue and al-fresco sitting and dining furniture. Challenge friends and family over the table tennis, take the water sports equipment and provided bicycles out for a spin, and linger outside into the evenings around the firepit. Inside, you’ll find high-tech amenities from a streaming TV and Sonos sound system to Wi-Fi.

This bright, bungalow-style residence takes its inspiration from mid-century modern style and Scandinavian design for a chic yet inviting vibe. A pair of palm-print lounge chairs welcome you to the open-concept dining room and fully equipped kitchen; in the adjacent living room, there’s room for everyone on a pair of sofas.

Coonanga has one master bedroom with a king bed, two bedrooms with queen beds, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans. For larger parties or those wanting more flexible accommodations, there’s also a double sofa bed in the living room.

Though Avalon may be a lesser known corner of Sydney, it’s well worth the visit. Make the 5-minute walk to Avalon Beach to join locals for a morning surf session, or explore the three other beaches within a 10-minute drive. Downtown Avalon, 2 minutes away by car, is a hub of great cafes and interesting shops, where you can enjoy the simple pleasure of a perfect flat white or relive your honeymoon with an intimate multi-course dinner.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience modern architecture with a Victorian-twist at this stylish home just off Albert Park Lake in Melbourne. Wake up with a soothing bath in the master's spa-like ensuite before enjoying a coffee in the backyard lounge. Catch up on a little reading while the kids bounce on the in-ground trampoline. Then, hop on the tram around the corner and head downtown to find a spot for brunch. 

Get together with the whole group in Albert Road's open concept main floor, and open the floor-to-ceiling patio doors to expand the common area to the lounge spaces outside. Feel secure and secluded in the backyard thanks to lush shrubbery outlining the villa perimeter. Inside, an eclectic collection of art is sure to spark conversation. 

Beneath chandelier lighting, Albert Road's formal dining area is the perfect place for a special announcement. After dinner, relax on the L-shaped sofa with a cocktail. Or, sneak away with someone special and sit by the library's fireplace. Should the mood strike, head outside for a midnight swim or have the entertainer in the group play your favorite song on the piano. 

Melbourne's most famous beach, St. Kilda, is just 7 minutes from home, and it's ideal for family swimming and water-sports. While you're in St. Kilda, check out Fitzroy Street for an incredible selection of cafes and restaurants. After the beach, head to the Melbourne Zoo to snap a few pics of Australia's native creatures. Then, spend the night bar hopping in the central business district, just 10 minutes away on the tram. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take yourself on holiday amid film-worthy scenery and magazine-worthy interiors at Kumanu. This modern vacation rental is stunning inside and out, with views of some of the South Island’s most incredible landscapes and beautifully appointed living spaces. Invite up to eight friends or family members to an idyllic setting that’s nevertheless only minutes from skiing, golf and lively central Queenstown.

The amenities at this luxury property range from a media room with satellite television and a sound system to Wi-Fi, a piano and a wine fridge. Glass walls connect the interiors with outdoor spaces featuring areas for sitting, lounging and dining; a barbecue; a hot tub and even an al-fresco fireplace.

Details such as an open-plan layout, wood floors and built-in bookcases give Kumanu a feeling of refined sophistication. Entertain with mountain views as the backdrop or unwind with a glass of New Zealand wine by the fireplace in the expansive living room, or stretch out with a book on the sectional in a separate sitting area. Follow the steps up to the dining area and adjacent fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has a king bed and private en-suite bathroom, and opens directly to the terrace. All but one of the beds can be converted to two twin beds if your party needs alternate accommodations. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are filled with stylish contemporary pieces, from geometric area rugs and plush velour chairs to upholstered headboards.

No matter what the season, Kumanu is close to a range of activities and entertainment. The villa is less than 48 km from the ski areas at The Remarkables and Coronet Peak, and less than 40 km from Queenstown Golf Course. Don’t miss the range of vibrant shops and restaurants in central Queenstown and, for a grown-up night out, try your luck at the casino or spend a honeymoon-worthy evening on a lake cruise.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Olive-green velvet armchairs are poised over the city parks’ carpet of green at this modern Melbourne apartment. Floor-to-ceiling windows spill light over timbered floors and offer up views over the Australian countryside. It’s 10 minutes or less to the Immigration Museum, National Gallery of Victoria, and the hallowed Melbourne Cricket Ground, and steps to the city’s famously good coffee spots.

A gourmet welcome basket greets you on arrival, along with panoramic views of Melbourne from a private balcony with a gas barbecue and alfresco dining for 6. After a day out in the city, flip on the sound system while you make dinner, tune in to the Apple TV, or share holiday photos via Wi-Fi. Guests are also welcome to use the shared indoor swimming pool and the gym in the building.

Gather in the great room with friends and family to pass sunny days and relaxed evenings. The open-concept space features a cozy sitting area with a sectional, velvet armchairs, and two loungers positioned in front of the window; a dining area with seating for 10; and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and three ovens in case you’re inspired by the produce at nearby Queen Victoria Market.

This vacation rental has one master bedroom with a king bed and ensuite bathroom, and 2 bedrooms that share a bathroom: one with a queen bed and one with a double bed. The king and double bedrooms look out over Fitzroy Gardens, an oasis of green with a historic home tucked in its 64 acres.

A stay at this villa gives you the luxury of being high above the city, but just steps from world-class coffee shops and more. Wander the city’s laneways, stopping for everything from a bakery snack to a honeymoon-worthy tasting menu, immerse yourself in the flora of Fitzroy Gardens and the Royal Botanic Gardens Victoria, and tee off at Burnley Golf Course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Envelop yourself in the soothing sounds of the gentle waves on the shoreline as you relax and unwind in this exceptional ground floor unit - Hillside Villa 1102. Of the Hillside Villas, building 1100 has a direct view of the shoreline and is close enough to the ocean to hear the waves crashing on the beach. 

Just a short walk or drive from the beach, golf, and downtown Kona, this vacation rental puts you close to the best of the Big Island. Its stylish, spacious living areas and two bedrooms are the perfect size for a sunny holiday with family, a couples' getaway or a warm Hawaiian honeymoon.

The villa’s welcoming lanai will help you ease into the island lifestyle, with panoramic views of gardens and ocean from its lounging and dining areas. Heat up the barbecue as you watch the sunset, or step indoors to enjoy the smart TV and Wi-Fi. For your comfort on the warmest days, the villa has both ceiling fans and air conditioning.

The glass wall separating the lanai from the great room can be pushed back, giving you the luxury of one large indoor-outdoor space. Listen to the waves as you lounge on the sectional in the sitting area, feel the warm breeze as you gather around the dining table and try out local fruits and seafood in the fully equipped kitchen.

Hillside Villa 1102 has an incredible master suite with a king bed, alfresco shower, lounge area and ocean views, and a beautifully appointed second bedroom with a queen bed and its own private terrace. Both bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms.

The Hillside pool is right across from the entry to your villa, along with a hot tub, barbecue area, and lounge chairs. You’ll also have access to the shared fitness center, spa and golf course at the Hualalai Resort, as well as the beach, a 5-minute walk away. Grab a locally sourced cup from the Hualalai Coffee Company, make a reservation at one of the resort’s restaurants or learn about island traditions at the Ka’upulehu Cultural Center. For more shopping and dining options, make the 20-minute drive into downtown Kona.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Throw your worries to the trade winds at Fairways South #15. From its generous lanai to its panoramic ocean views, this Big Island vacation rental invites you to settle in and simply relax. And once you’ve had enough of that, stroll to a nearby beach or take advantage of the golf, tennis and spa facilities at the nearby Mauna Kea Resort.

Watch the sun move across the golf course and sink into the Pacific from outdoor living areas with a pool, whirlpool, and a spacious covered lanai with living and dining furniture. Lush gardens and soothing water features add to the feeling of laid-back luxury—and Wi-Fi access makes it easy to share those vacation vibes with friends and family back at home.

The villa’s open-concept great room is also open to the lanai, letting warm breezes waft over the sitting area and a gourmet kitchen with a welcoming breakfast bar. High ceilings add to the airy ambience, while palm prints and warm wood floors are classic Hawaiian touches that bring local charm to the space.

Fairways South #15 has one bedroom with a king bed and one bedroom with two queen/double bunk beds in the main house, one bedroom with two queen beds that can be accessed through the garden, and one bedroom with a king bed in the guest house, for a couple seeking a honeymoon-style hideaway. All four bedrooms have private ensuite bathrooms.

Guests are welcome to opt in to resort privileges at the Mauna Kea Resort at extra cost for access to the golf courses, oceanfront tennis courts, and spa and fitness facilities during your holiday. For shopping and dining options beyond the resort, make the 5-minute drive to the town of Kawaihae or the 15-minute drive to Kamuela.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID #: W26732517-01

listing.listing_description:
Get to the cultural heart of Bali at Villa Kelusa. Perched in the foothills below the village of Kelusa, this private estate is only a few minutes from the restaurants, galleries, world-class hotels and more in Ubud. Reserve this four-bedroom luxury property to unwind with extended family or take a totally relaxed holiday with friends.

The villa features four buildings set on nearly eight acres of lush grounds overlooking the mountains and jungle. Take in the panoramas from the two infinity pools, the terraces with loungers or the al-fresco dining area—or even as you prep the evening meal on the barbecue. Other amenities include a cable TV, DVD player and Wi-Fi, as well as daily breakfast, and butler and shuttle service.

Two separate, traditionally inspired houses make up Villa Kelusa: Pondok Sapi, or “shed of the cow,” and Pondok Surya, or “sunset house.” Designed as the residence of a retired American TV journalist, Pondok Sapi has an entertainment cabana with a lounge area, an open-air living pavilion with a fully equipped kitchen and a glass studio where the bedrooms are located. Pondok Surya has its own living area and a second fully equipped kitchen.

There are two bedrooms in Pondok Sapi and two in Pondok Surya; all four have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and several have features worthy of a honeymoon suite, such as al-fresco showers.

Many villas claim to be close to Bali’s beaches; the nearest attractions to this vacation rental are museums. Simply make the trip down the hill to Ubud to marvel over the art collections, visit the local market and take a tour of the royal palace and gardens. Of course, if you’d like a bit of sun and sand, Echo Beach, Kuta Beach and Nusa Dua Beach are all within day-trip distance.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Amid the serene rice paddies of southwestern Bali and situated less than a mile from Berawa Beach is Villa Amy, one of only five elite Dea Villas Balinese vacation homes located on the island nation of Indonesia. Villa Amy is staffed by attentive professionals and can generously host up to six overnight guests with three private and amply sized sleeping quarters. Great for families with children or just a group of friends, Amy at Dea offers bucolic surroundings while remaining in proximity to many of Bali’s prized attractions.

The villa really drives home the tropical motif with lava-stone steps surrounded by ponds, connecting the estate’s three separate pavilions. The living pavilion is open concept with ornate and majestic pillars making inhabitants feel a touch regal. A fully equipped kitchen awaits the knowing hands of the culinary genius in your entourage, but there is also a capable chef on staff ready to take charge if you just feel like kicking back.

The guest suites have each been afforded the highest degree of privacy, as well as being ample in size and possessing amenities such as flat screen satellite televisions and security safes. The bedrooms have been adorned with fascinating Indonesian objets d’art and options for bedding include a king size or twin beds. Each room also boasts beautiful en-suite alfresco bathrooms with rain showers and stone tubs carved out of giant river rocks.

Berawa Beach has black sands and powerful waves that make it less than ideal for swimming, though the area is highly prized by surfers from around the world. Anyone can pick up surfing in Berawa, as there are plenty of stores renting or selling Balinese and international brand surfboards, as well as friendly instructors providing lessons to anyone, regardless of experience. Restaurants line these surfer havens, offering delicious libations as well as a mix of Indonesian and Western cuisine. Come experience a dream vacation in Bali with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located at the beating heart of up-and-coming Berawa (Canggu), this listing captures a slice of Balinese paradise in a happening seaside town. The sound of falling water and the swaying of vines and palm fronds add to the poolside peacefulness. Guests will enjoy the carved wooden décor and Balinese art worked into a modern interior, with world-class beaches lying just a few minutes away.

Guests will soon settle into Villa Elite Cassia with ease. A selection of impressive stone sun loungers provide easy access to the refreshing pool, which is constantly fed by a number of carved waterfalls. Towering palm trees and dangling creepers caress the water's surface, giving the impression of the jungle making its presence felt inside this charming listing. With an impressive array of spacious bedrooms and a banquet-sized dining table under the immaculate exterior gazebo, this is a perfect group choice, with the provided-as-standard butler and chef serving drinks, snacks and scrumptious meals to all guests' specific needs. 

The Canggu district is especially well-serviced when it comes to food and restaurant options. Guests can feast on delicious and popular local dishes like satays or nasi ayam served from cheerful warungs (small food stalls), or choose from a range of well-regarded established Western, Japanese or international restaurants. A particularly strong cafe culture ensures visitors will find tasty teas, sweet eats and caffeine options abounding. 

As a beach resort, guests can make the most of access to the pristine local beaches less than five minutes drive away. Take in the shimmer of the sun on the Indian Ocean at the lengthy and excellently-regarded Batu Bolong beach, one of the best of its kind in this part of Bali, with a fantastic reputation for longboarding. Rent a board, swim in the gentle surf or simply lounge in the one of the oceanside cafes with a cold drink, as the impressive stone temple of the Pura Batumejan complex overlooks the tropical scene.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sunshine gilds the polished concrete floors at this industrial-chic residence just outside downtown Melbourne. The villa’s architectural bona fides show through in its airy ceilings and light-filled bedrooms. Catch contemporary art at Abbotsford Convent and feed animals at Collingwood Children’s Farm, or take the train into the city.

This vacation rental opens to a private backyard with a gas barbecue, alfresco dining for 6, and a patch of greenery shaded by a neighboring tree. Inside, you’ll find a satellite TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi, and a Nespresso machine, along with hidden-yet-thoughtful details like heated bathroom floors.

An expanse of polished concrete links the sitting area, where a cognac leather sectional invites you to lounge under the high ceilings, with the open-plan dining area and fully equipped kitchen. There’s more seating at the kitchen’s breakfast bar, along with views of a courtyard garden. Primary-color accent pillows, geometric artwork, and natural-wood accents add playful touches of warmth to the streamlined space.

This luxury property has 1 bedroom on the ground floor and 2 upstairs, laid out around a family room. The ground-floor bedroom has a queen bed, access to a hall bathroom, and a door to the courtyard off the kitchen. Upstairs, there’s a master bedroom with a king bed and ensuite bathroom. There is also a room with a queen bed and shared access to a hallway bathroom with the kids' room, containing two twin beds.

The villa is a short walk from Abbotsford Convent, a one-of-a-kind venue with galleries, gardens, and eateries in a former convent, as well as Collingwood Children’s Farm, where young Australians can help brush cows and cuddle guinea pigs. It’s a 10-minute drive or less to the 64-acre Fitzroy Gardens, Melbourne Cricket Ground, and the city’s array of world-class coffee shops, honeymoon-worthy restaurants and intriguing boutiques where you can pick up holiday souvenirs.

listing.listing_description:
Secluded amid lush tropical flora in the Canggu area of Southwest Bali, this contemporary masterpiece offers resort-style pleasures in total privacy. The design balances modernist, Bauhaus-inspired principles with rustic Balinese accents and an extraordinary collection of artwork ranging from Buddhist statuary to vibrant paintings embedded in natural stone. The surf breaks and authentic Balinese charm of Pererenan are less than 10 minutes away.

The sprawling estate features numerous terraces and patios nestled oasis-like amid the luxuriant trees. Ample lounge areas in the sun and shade accompany the swimming pool and reflecting pool, while a dreamy pavilion with daybeds enjoys privacy below. The main living and dining area features an open-concept layout and sliding glass doors opening to the pool, which can be kept closed on hot afternoons to form a cool cocoon. The gourmet kitchen is fully equipped with high-end appliances, and guests have the option of hiring a private chef. Enchanting lighting and an outdoor cinema inspire long evenings under the stars.

Villa Utopia enjoys an ideal balance of seclusion and proximity to some of the finest destinations in Bali. You’re about 15 kilometers from the boutique-lined streets and famous surf breaks of Seminyak, while the lesser-known surfer paradise of Pererenan is just minutes away. Echo Beach (less than 5 kilometers from your door) is also an outstanding spot for surfers and families alike. Enjoy a fun-filled day of waterslides, bowling, and tennis at Finn’s Recreation Club, or explore the majesty of local Balinese culture at Tanah Lot Temple. 

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set in the rolling Brynderwyn Range, this hilltop mansion offers a unique combination of sustainable living and countryside luxury. Guests can wander the themed halls and gorgeously-outfitted rooms, before taking in glorious views of the grounds and gardens. Experience a sunrise yoga session, swim in the serene pool, or soak up the rays in a recliner, before hitting the nearby beach or trailhead.

Triumphant, panoramic views welcome new arrivals to Te Arai lodge, with the special aura of this home apparent as soon as the impressive stone facade comes into view. The rich North island heritage of the home is clear, from the ornate ferns hanging over the welcoming dining area, to the indigineous woodland that hugs that pathways around the home. After a session in the exercise room or luxurious steam in the sauna, wander through the crisp air of the home’s garden patches to take in the true scale and grandeur of this home.

From Te Arai, guests can truly experience the natural wealth of this part of New Zealand. Just a short drive away is one of the North Island’s most scenic beaches, Te Arai; ideal for swimming, surfing and horse riding. Excellent hiking and scenic picnics are nearby at the picturesque Tawharanui reserve, while guests can make a surprising short drive to reach the bright lights of Auckland, just down the coast. In the evening, the saltwater pool and barbecue of the villa awaits your return, with delicious garden-to-table vegetables grown in the estate grounds.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Base yourself in a setting that’s anything but basic at the spectacular Cardrona Terraces. This one-of-a-kind South Island property pairs Spanish Mission architecture with classic mountain-lodge decor, and the seclusion of 42 private acres of land with a location close to skiing and other outdoor adventure in the Wanaka area. Invite up to twelve guests for a family reunion, a getaway with friends or a holiday spent exploring the gorgeous New Zealand surroundings.

Revel in the mountain views from outdoor living areas with a heated pool, al-fresco kitchen and fireplace, a barbecue and dining for twelve. If you’re coming to the area to ski, relax after a day on the slopes with the help of the Sky-equipped TV, wet bar, fireplace and Wi-Fi. There’s also a library if you need to catch up on emails—or just want a quiet moment with a book.

This residence has more than 7,500 square feet of living space, giving you the luxury of having everyone together or spreading out to find your own space. The living and dining rooms pair traditional style with playful accents, such as English roll-arm sofas spread with mustard-yellow pillows. And the fully equipped kitchen is a statement of its own, with cherry-red cabinets in a high-impact, high-gloss finish.

Each of the six bedrooms at Cardrona Terraces has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and opens to an outdoor space, whether a private balcony or the courtyard. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms feature an eclectic yet inviting mix of furnishings, colors and textures.

Close to both the soothing fields of Wanaka Lavender Farm and the jaw-dropping peaks of Mount Aspiring National Park, this vacation rental offers something for everyone. Find both laid-back shops and restaurants and plenty of outdoor adventures in downtown Wanaka, book either a honeymoon-worthy lake cruise or a heart-pumping jet boat ride, and get out into the mountains on foot, bike or skis.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The magnificent Seseh Beach Villa I is located in a peaceful rural village on Bali’s southwestern coast overlooking the Indian Ocean. This Indonesian island represents a banquet for the mind, body and soul. Though relatively small, Bali offers the natural beauty of oceans, volcanic mountains and verdant rain forests while showcasing both ancient and modern culture, including some extraordinary cuisine.

Outdoors, the sun loungers and rooftop terrace invite relaxation while taking in the oceanfront. Enjoy casual lunches and tropical evening meals in the covered dining pavilion, followed by a stroll down to the beach. This private vacation rental is also loaded with perks. The PlayStation, Wii and Xbox along with a large screen TV will keep both the children and “big kids” amused on the rare rainy day. You will be looked after by a full time manager, butler, 24-hour security and a personal chef.

The interior of this villa features large, air conditioned, open plan living spaces. The furnishings are smart and contemporary, with a subtle nod to retro design. Large windows and openings foster a seamless indoor/outdoor living experience. The glamorous wet bar may soon become the favorite haunt of the consummate entertainer in your entourage.

At night, enjoy air conditioned comfort, or slide back the French doors and let the sea breeze cool your bedroom as you fall asleep to the soothing sounds of the ocean waves. With a total of five bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, Seseh Beach Villa I can accommodate up to ten guests. All of the bedrooms provide televisions and ceiling fans as well as outdoor showers and bathtubs. It’s perfect for a multigenerational family holiday!

Stroll through the village and meet the friendly locals as they go about their daily work and religious devotion, giving you an authentic glimpse into the lives of the people who make this island so warm and welcoming. For those who wish to venture further afield, a car and driver is on standby. Explore the island or indulge in Seminyak’s trendy restaurants, bars and shops. Or perhaps you’re craving a round at the Nirwana Bali Golf Course? Weddings and events are a villa specialty, with the spacious garden and swimming pool providing the perfect setting for your special day!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Malaathina is located off a quiet lane in the rural community of Umalas in Bali, known for its beautiful rice paddies and traditional way of life. The villa’s extravagant size, excellent facilities and carefully considered layout make it an ideal choice for families and friends holidaying together as well as an excellent venue for special events and celebrations. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

Lusciously landscaped and serenely situated, there is much to enjoy here. From fabulous indoor and outdoor spaces to relax and first-class entertainment facilities, Villa Malaathina has you covered. Spend lazy days on a lounger next to the pristine swimming pool. Practice your sun salutations in the dedicated yoga studio. Work out at the impressively equipped gym. Or gather with friends at the end of the day and enjoy a meal cooked by your personal chef in the enormous poolside Teppanyaki pavilion.

The grand, air conditioned library offers wonderful respite from the heat and is a great venue for informal catch-ups over a coffee or an afternoon of sport on the big screen. The home cinema features a fabulous 62-inch television and loads of comfortable sofas. Indoor and outdoor dining areas cater for casual suppers, formal dinners and long lunches. Sip on a cocktail or enjoy an ice-cold beer, and watch one of Bali’s spectacular sunsets from one of the four bar areas – your favorite cocktail in hand!

Seven spacious bedrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at Villa Malaathina. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, and the master suite offers a rooftop terrace. Getting to the outdoors is a breeze, with direct access to a terrace, balcony or garden in all but one suite. All the while, a team of professional and caring staff will ensure that your holiday goes smoothly.

Despite its charming rustic feel, the restaurants, bars and shopping of Seminyak are just a fifteen minute drive away from Villa Malaathina. The nearest surfing beaches are Batu Bolong and Berawa Beach. Other options for activities include the low-key seaside restaurants and cafes of Echo Beach, the stunning heritage Hotel Tugu, the award-winning Greg Norman-designed Nirwana Bali Golf Course and the dramatic sea temple at Tanah Lot. The splendors of this exclusive area of Indonesia await!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Kemala Villa is a stunning luxury residence in Canggu on the Indonesian island of Bali. Situated on 1,750 square meters of lush estate in the southwest region of Berawa, the villa is a short drive from the stylish town of Seminyak as well as Canggu Beach. Featuring superb outdoor and interior living areas and five deluxe bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, the vacation rental also includes a private chef, butler, property manager, and security guard.

The villa's bi-level design includes an expansive ground-level terrace with beautiful swimming pool, along with an ample, upper-level balcony outside adjoining the interior living areas. Savor enchanting days in the South Pacific sun, floating in the pool's lagoon-like waters and sipping cool refreshments on royal-red loungers. Soothe your body with a massage and a dip in the pool's delicious hot tub. Relish a barbeque lunch alfresco and sip cocktails in the canopied lounge. Surrounding gardens of native plants and flowers including hibiscus, orchids, yellow palms, and jasmine engender an ambiance of tropical enchantment.

Lovely doors open from the balcony to the interior living and dining room, where the high, vaulted ceilings and open plan create an exquisite space for evenings with family and friends. Sip aperitifs in the lounge, listening to your favorite tunes on the Sonos system, as your private chef prepares dinner in the fully equipped kitchen. Then gather around the gorgeous dining table for a Southeast Asian feast. At night, play pool in the charming parlor, or retire to the media room, where a 50-inch TV, Wii console, and well-stocked library of books, CDs, and DVDs, will keep adults and kids entertained.

The villa features five fabulous bedrooms, four with king beds and one with two twins—providing ample space for families and destination wedding guests. All have ensuite bathrooms. The master suite and one of the king guestrooms open to the upper balcony, while the other two king bedrooms open to the ground-floor terrace. The master suite additionally has an alfresco shower.

Beyond Kemala Villa, you're within minutes of some of the finest beaches and dining on Bali. Seminyak and Petitenget are both minutes away, as are Canggu Beach and Echo Beach. Nirwana Bali Golf Course is about twelve kilometers from your door.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This superb Wailea Beach villa is a short walk from the resort's beach and pools and offers 2,300 square feet of beautifully furnished living space. Two ample king suites and outstanding amenities for cooking and entertainment form an ideal haven for two couples, while additional bedding can accommodate children or friends. The vacation rental includes access to the resort's pools, fitness center, business center, and activities area, while the myriad splendors of Wailea and Makena surround you.

Located on the fourth floor of a five-story building, the villa enjoys expansive views of the Pacific Ocean and the legendary Maui sunset. A spacious lanai invites you to relish alfresco meals from the barbeque and savor cool refreshments in the ocean breeze. Glass doors open to a spacious, open-concept interior, where the fully equipped kitchen serves a breakfast bar, both dining tables, and an adjoining den. An ample salon includes a lovely white sectional and two leather armchairs, ideal for movie-watching at night or simply enjoying the vistas through picture windows. Natural wood accents and fine original artwork harmonize with the sublime beauty of this incomparable island.

Both of the villa's bedrooms feature king-size beds and ensuite bathrooms. The larger master suite also includes a walk-in closet, and there is a soaking tub in its bathroom. The den beside the living area features a pullout sofa and pocket doors, forming an extra sleeping room. The understated yet gorgeous décor of the bedrooms summons rustic Maui, providing peaceful sanctuaries for downtime and rest.

The villa is perfectly placed for enjoying the riches of Maui's leeward coast. You're a short walk from Wailea Beach, the Shops at Wailea, and the resort's oceanfront pools (which include an adult pool and a kid-friendly family pool), while a dozen other spectacular beaches await you in the area of Wailea and Makena, including Keawakapu Beach. Golfers are within minutes of Wailea Golf Club and Makena Golf Course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
When you arrive at Wailea Sunset Estate and pass through glass doors etched with Hawaiian scenes, you’ll know your dreams of paradise are about to come true. This truly magnificent four-bedroom home sits right up against the turquoise waters of the Pacific Ocean, presenting stunning views of the surrounding islands. The only thing separating you from your private stretch of beach is a lush green lawn and a swinging hammock.

Spend tranquil days on the sun-kissed terrace, soaking up the island’s most famous feature. Cool down with a plunge in the pool then rinse off under the outdoor shower. Launch a kayak or snorkel right off the foot of your property. Light the barbecue and sizzle fresh surf ‘n’ turf for lunch and serve it around the al fresco dining table. The upstairs deck is the perfect spot to retreat with a book. Host a garden party on the front lawn or, on quieter nights, ease into the hot tub and watch an unforgettable Maui sunset.

Inside, traditional Polynesian materials adorn the home, adding warmth and authenticity. Wicker panels line the ceiling while elegant furnishings are made from native wood. Sliding glass walls allow light and air to pour into the great room, where you can sink into a soft sofa or prepare gourmet meals on high-end appliances in the chef-appointed kitchen. The living room houses an immense 3D television and state-of-the-art home theater system in a custom-made entertainment cabinet. A tasting room gives connoisseurs a venue to test their palate.

The villa has four breathtaking bedrooms also decorated with traditional dark wood furniture and paneled ceilings. The rooms are spacious and comfortable and each contains quality linens, entertainment unit, and a well-appointed en-suite bathroom. All open directly onto a deck or lanai. The Master bedroom has a King size bed and comfortable armchairs facing an HD flatscreen, plus a ocean-view deck.

When you’re ready to explore, start by spending time on each of Wailea’s five white sand beaches. Surfers can catch waves North, in Kihei or Lahaina, while golfers will find 54-holes of championship golf just a mile away at the Wailea Golf Club. It’s a quick, five-minute drive to shops and restaurants, and one should not miss out on tours of Maui’s spectacular natural world.

Permit #: Hotel Zoned

listing.listing_description:
Disconnect for a while at this airy riverside villa overlooking the rice paddies of Canggu. Start your day with a yoga session in the open-sided studio beside a Balinese temple. Sip your morning tea while you wander the lush gardens. And, relax even further with the help of the full-time staff. When you’re ready to explore, start with a tour of Tanah Lot Temple, less than 10km from home.

Balinese architecture strikes the perfect balance between seclusion and social space. At the compound-style estate’s center, the refreshing swimming pool acts as a meeting place, connecting the standalone suites and main house. Inspect Hansa’s interior, and you’ll find an inspiring mix of local artifacts and cutting-edge tech features. There’s also a cozy media room if you want to catch up on some TV.

After the private chef has served dinner at the alfresco table, challenge a friend to a game of billiards beneath the shingle-roof bale or stop by the wet bar for a cocktail to sip in the riverside lounge. In the afternoon, pick a sunny spot to work on your tan from a poolside lounge chair. And for a little extra relaxation, book yourself a massage or see about an in-house spa treatment.

When it’s time to hit the beach, you won’t be disappointed along the Canggu coast. This area is known for its black-sand beaches, which is a result of ancient volcanic activity. The coast is also world-famous among the surfing elite, so if you’re interested in a lesson, this is a perfect opportunity. For a night out, visit the beachfront party at Finn’s Recreation Club and sip tropical cocktails while you dance under the moonlight.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hold an unforgettable event at Kaba Kaba Estate. Set on three acres of lush grounds in Tabanan, this luxurious and private villa offers hotel-worthy amenities, not to mention a full staff. Eight bedrooms, three pools, a spa, and a location outside Seminyak make this property perfect for a wedding, reunion or anniversary party or just a tropical family getaway.

Nestled into rice paddies, Kaba Kaba Estate is a quiet oasis on Bali. Have a swim in the large pool, which looks out on a palm-dotted lawn, or in one of the plunge pools. Relax in a lounge chair on the pool deck, bliss out at the spa, enjoy a book or movie in the library and media room or work out at the property’s tennis court or gym. The villa has Wi-Fi access, or you can ask the staff any questions.

The villa is decorated in dramatic Balinese style, with sliding glass walls that instantly turn indoor living spaces into outdoor ones. The open-plan living and dining area offers plenty of seating on long white sectionals, with cushions adding a pop of colour. A vaulted ceiling and wood paneling in the library feel traditional yet airy, and a metallic ceiling, Persian-style rug and velour upholstery create an intimate atmosphere in the media room. For your convenience, there’s a fully equipped kitchen.

The eight bedrooms at Kaba Kaba Estate have king beds, en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and gorgeous views of the lawn. Four-poster beds draped with curtains have a romantic feel, and a mix of contemporary and antique pieces gives each bedroom a unique look. In the bathrooms, glassed-in showers and large tubs invite you to relax.

From the villa, it’s 5 km to the Nirwana Bali Golf Club, just under 6 km to Tanah Lot Sea Temple, 11 km to Seseh Beach, 15 km to Echo Beach and about 17 km to Finns Recreation Club. Seminyak is 24 km away, Kuta is about 25 km away, Waterbom Park is 26 km away, and Ngurah Rai International Airport is 30 km away. Further afield, you’ll find Mount Batukaru, 35 km away, Ubud, 37 km away, and the Elephant Safari Park, 47 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With oceanfront views and surrounding greenery, a series of pavilions with antique “Joglo” architecture comprises this traditionally constructed villa. Occupying the edge of a lush escarpment, nothing but Bali’s unspoilt coast unfurls beyond, oozing peace and tranquility. Famous black-sand shores, coral reefs, and dolphin watching tours at Lovina Beach are mere minutes away by car. 

Floor-to-ceiling windows stretch the full length of walls, giving the illusion that you’re one with the outdoors. Statement pieces crafted from seashells alongside driftwood-inspired décor incorporate beachy elements into the open living space. Look up to find soaring wood ceilings with intricately carved beams that showcase historic designs. A gentle sea breeze keeps you cool, but when that’s not enough, a dip in the cyan-hued infinity pool is a refreshing option. The terrace looks directly out onto the dense, neighboring hilltops and is a scenic spot to watch the fiery sunset disappear behind the mountain vista. 

Experience the tranquility of rinsing off in the alfresco rain shower or soaking in the outdoor tub. Artfully crafted stone walls, lined with local shrubbery, in the front yard create a sense of total privacy while cliffs in the back drop off into palm-lined brush, allowing unobstructed viewing. Treat yourself to the deliciousness of an in-house chef to free up more of your time for exploring nearby hot spots; Banjar Hot Springs, Beji Temple, and Busungbiu Rice Terraces are just a few day trip options. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to a self-contained paradise in Bali at The Pala at Pandawa. This six-bedroom luxury property in the Bukit is the flagship villa of Pandawa Cliff Estate. Its oceanfront setting and full staff make it the perfect tropical hideaway, but it can also be reserved with neighboring villa The Rose as a stunning location for a family reunion, special celebration or destination wedding.

Your holiday at The Pala includes the services of a private chef, housekeeper, butler and driver, as well as the use of the shared gym, spa, and tennis and squash courts at Pandawa Cliff Estate. Make the lush garden and stone amphitheater the backdrop to a wedding ceremony, or take advantage of the infinity pool, daybeds, al-fresco dining area and balé to simply relax. Grown-ups will appreciate the house’s Wi-Fi, while kids will enjoy the games room with Nintendo Wii.

Inside the villa, living and dining areas on two levels make the most of the ocean views, and slide-away glass walls invite the warm breezes in. Throughout the villa, sleek details like polished stone floors and clean-lined furnishings are balanced by traditional touches such as carved furniture and painted ceilings. While there is a fully equipped kitchen, the private chef will be happy to prepare breakfast and other meals from a menu.

All six bedrooms at this vacation rental have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and many have honeymoon-suite-inspired features such as living areas and al-fresco showers. Three of the bedrooms have king beds that can be separated into two twin beds if needed.

From The Pala’s perch above the ocean, it’s a short drive to the white sands of Pandawa Beach, the restaurants and nightlife in the town of Nusa Dua and the fairways of the New Kuta Golf Club. For a day trip, check out the incredible scenery and learn about local legends at the sea temple at Uluwatu.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy views of the sea amid lush, tropical gardens at this villa whose name means “high river.” Sitting on over 100 meters of beach frontage, this is one of our top Bali villa rentals. Whether you’re looking for a relaxing vacation, or one filled with adventure, Bali features plenty of natural landscapes to explore, ranging from white sandy beaches to volcanic mountains and lush rain forests.

Soak in the sun on one of the lawn chairs in the back yard—they face palm trees, the ocean and a free-form, 18-meter infinity-edge swimming pool. If you’re feeling up for some exercise, go explore the surrounding area on one of the estate’s mountain bikes, or challenge a loved one to a tennis match on one of the shared courts. You can relax afterwards with a massage in the garden balé. To further help you unwind, there are staff on site to take care of the everyday tasks like cooking and cleaning.

You’ll find plenty of seating in the open-air living pavilion. It features multiple sofas surrounding a glass-topped coffee table underneath a vaulted, exposed-beam ceiling and offers views of the garden. There’s also a large, Saurwood table for formal dinners as well as a coconut-shell bar for cocktails. Meanwhile, a covered boardwalk takes you into the bright kitchen, fully stocked with modern appliances and plenty of counter space.

Up to eight guests can stay the night in this villa’s four bedrooms, making it an ideal getaway for a group of friends or family. All suites offer king size beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, while the master suite also boasts an en-suite garden bathroom with an alfresco shower. Additional bedding is available for an extra cost.

Villa Sungai Tinggi is only steps away from the beach where you’ll find some of the island’s best surf. It’s also only 10 km to the restaurants and shops of Seminyak and the renowned greens at the Nirwana Bali Golf Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The magnificent Seseh Beach Villa II is located in a peaceful rural village on Bali’s southwestern coast overlooking the Indian Ocean. This Indonesian island represents a banquet for the mind, body and soul. Though relatively small, Bali offers the natural beauty of oceans, volcanic mountains and verdant rain forests while showcasing both ancient and modern culture, including some extraordinary cuisine.

Outdoors, the sun loungers and sun beds invite relaxation while taking in the oceanfront. Enjoy casual lunches and tropical evening meals in the covered dining pavilion, followed by a stroll down to the beach. This private vacation rental is also loaded with perks. The PlayStation, Wii and Xbox along with a 60-inch smart TV will keep both the children and “big kids” amused on the rare rainy day. You will be looked after by a full time manager, butler, 24-hour security and a personal chef.

The interior of this villa features large, air conditioned, open plan living spaces. The furnishings are smart and contemporary, with a subtle nod to retro design. Large windows and openings foster a seamless indoor/outdoor living experience. The glamorous wet bar may soon become the favorite haunt of the consummate entertainer in your entourage.

At night, enjoy air conditioned comfort, or slide back the French doors and let the sea breeze cool your bedroom as you fall asleep to the soothing sounds of the ocean waves. With a total of six luxury bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, Seseh Beach Villa II can accommodate up to fourteen guests. The villa provides a variety of sleeping arrangements so there is something for everyone. It’s perfect for a multigenerational family holiday!

Stroll through the village and meet the friendly locals as they go about their daily work and religious devotion, giving you an authentic glimpse into the lives of the people who make this island so warm and welcoming. For those who wish to venture further afield, a car and driver is on standby. Explore the island or indulge in Seminyak’s trendy restaurants, bars and shops. Or perhaps you’re craving a round at the Nirwana Bali Golf Course? Weddings and events are a villa specialty, with the spacious garden and swimming pool providing the perfect setting for your special day!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
